code: const initialState={items:[]};const indexTask=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type==="ACTIONS_INDEX_TASK"){if(action.payload.length===0){return{...state,items:[]};}const stateItems=state.items.concat(action.payload);return{...state,items:stateItems};}return state;};export default indexTask;
